Name: Los Wanamey Group
description:
Mercedes is a member of the LOS WANAMEY communal bank.  She is 52 years old and has a partner and 6 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business growing fruit.  She has been in the business for a long time and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day.  She is a responsible and diligent person.  She wants to continue working so that she can keep on supporting her family. 

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and manure, among other things.

The group members are thankful for the loans and they are committed to paying the established installments.
